description: YaoYao è una giovane adepti di Liyue che utilizza il potere del Dendro per guarire e supportare il team. Eccelle nella guarigione e nell'applicazione Dendro.
info: YaoYao si concentra su HP% e Healing Bonus per massimizzare la guarigione. Energy Recharge è utile per uptime costante del Burst.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Toss 'N' Turn Spear
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Raphanus Sky Cluster
skills.desc: YaoYao throws out White Jade Radishes that will explode when they hit opponents or after a certain period of time, dealing Dendro DMG and healing nearby active characters.
skills.details_html:
Raphanus Sky Cluster
YaoYao throws out White Jade Radishes that will explode when they hit opponents or after a certain period of time, dealing Dendro DMG and healing nearby active characters.

skills.name: Moonjade Descent
skills.desc: YaoYao calls upon a myriad of White Jade Radishes to fall from the sky, dealing Dendro DMG and healing nearby active characters.
skills.details_html:
Moonjade Descent
YaoYao calls upon a myriad of White Jade Radishes to fall from the sky, dealing Dendro DMG and healing nearby active characters.

passive_talents.name: Starscatter
passive_talents.desc: When White Jade Radishes explode, active characters within their AoE will gain 15% Dendro DMG Bonus for 8s and 15 Elemental Mastery for 8s.

passive_talents.name: In Others' Shoes
passive_talents.desc: When White Jade Radishes explode, they will heal active characters within their AoE based on 2.5% of YaoYao's Max HP every 0.5s for 5s.

passive_talents.name: Tailing on Tiptoes
passive_talents.desc: When YaoYao is in the party, your own party members' Movement SPD is increased by 5%.

constellations.name: Osmanthus Wine
constellations.desc: When White Jade Radishes explode, active characters within their AoE will gain 15% Dendro DMG Bonus for 8s and 15 Elemental Mastery for 8s.

constellations.name: Clouds Cover Five Peaks
constellations.desc: While affected by the Adeptal Legacy state caused by Moonjade Descent, if White Jade Radishes explode, they will heal active characters within their AoE based on 3% of YaoYao's Max HP every 0.5s for 5s.

constellations.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Raphanus Sky Cluster by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Moon's Composed Brow
constellations.desc: YaoYao's Max HP will be increased by 15% for 15s after using Raphanus Sky Cluster.

constellations.name: A Thousand Nights' Dawnsong
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Moonjade Descent by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Golden Soul's Return
constellations.desc: After using Raphanus Sky Cluster or Moonjade Descent, YaoYao will gain 4 Elemental Energy for every 5 White Jade Radishes that explode.
